title: Peru people of the Andes
creator_credit: Milan Herzog and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Explores the Chincheros Valley near Cuzco and contrasts the community life in a self contained Indian Village with that of the tenant farmers who work on the haciendas. Illustrates Peru’s recent economic progress as evidenced in the new mining camps, transportation facilities and the wealth which is concentrated in Lima. (Revision of 1940 film, “Peru”.)
